briefdescription.para: Default maximum rotation speed in degrees per second.
Default minimum movement speed before the ship stops completely.
Default minimum rotation speed before rotation stops completely.
Default movement acceleration in units per second squared.
Default base movement speed in units per second.
Default exponential decay factor for rotation when input stops.
Default exponential decay factor for movement when input stops.
Default base rotation speed multiplier.
Maximum rotation speed in degrees per second.
Minimum movement speed before the ship stops completely.
Minimum rotation speed before rotation stops completely.
Movement acceleration in units per second squared.
Base movement speed in units per second.
Exponential decay factor for rotation when input stops.
Exponential decay factor for movement when input stops.
Base rotation speed multiplier.
Current movement speed after applying input and dampening.
Current rotation angle in degrees.
Target rotation angle derived from input direction.
Shortest angular distance to target rotation.
Current rotation speed after applying input and dampening.
Indicates whether input is currently being received.
Current throttle value from input (0.0 to 1.0).
Current steering input as 2D direction vector.
Current velocity vector in world space.
Pointer to the scene node component for transform operations.

detaileddescription.para: Set during onAttach(). Must not be null for movement to apply.

briefdescription.para: Called when the component is attached to a GameObject.

detaileddescription.para: Retrieves reference to the SceneNodeComponent for transform operations.

parameterdescription.para: The GameObject this component is being attached to.

briefdescription.para: Sets the movement direction and throttle.

detaileddescription.para: Updates the target rotation angle based on the input direction and calculates the shortest angular distance to the target.

parameterdescription.para: Normalized 2D direction vector from analog stick.
Magnitude of the stick input (0.0 to 1.0).

briefdescription.para: Updates movement and rotation each frame.

detaileddescription.para: Applies rotation towards the target angle with dampening, then integrates velocity to update position. Handles both active input and coasting (when input stops) with exponential decay.

briefdescription.para: Returns the current steering input direction.

simplesect.para: Const reference to the 2D steering input vector.

briefdescription.para: Returns the current throttle value (0.0 to 1.0).
Returns the current velocity vector.

simplesect.para: Const reference to the 3D velocity vector in world space.

briefdescription.para: Returns the current speed as a ratio of maximum speed.
Returns the maximum rotation speed in degrees per second.
Returns the minimum movement speed threshold.

simplesect.para: Movement speed threshold below which movement stops.

briefdescription.para: Returns the minimum rotation speed threshold.

simplesect.para: Rotation speed threshold below which rotation stops.

briefdescription.para: Returns the movement acceleration in units per second squared.
Returns the maximum movement speed in units per second.
Returns the rotation dampening factor.
Returns the movement dampening factor.
Returns the current rotation angle in degrees.
Returns the current position from the SceneNodeComponent.

simplesect.para: Current world-space position, or zero vector if no SceneNodeComponent.

briefdescription.para: Sets the maximum rotation speed in degrees per second.
Sets the minimum movement speed threshold.
Sets the minimum rotation speed threshold.
Sets the movement acceleration in units per second squared.
Sets the maximum movement speed in units per second.
Sets the rotation dampening factor.
Sets the movement dampening factor.
Resets all physics parameters to their default values.
